posts.post_content:
I have a double of the 1925 Turf Sisler card and would like to trade it for a similar card in value/subject/type/age/condition.

PM or e-mail me if you are interested in trying for a trade.

I also have the Boxing card (Carpentier) from this set I'd like to trade away as well (I have some others from the set if anyone is interested I can provide scans of those too).
